00020 Camera::Camera(const Transform &world2cam,
00021                float hither, float yon,
00022                        float sopen, float sclose, Film *f) {
00023         WorldToCamera = world2cam;
00024         CameraToWorld = WorldToCamera.GetInverse();
00025         ClipHither = hither;
00026         ClipYon = yon;
00027         ShutterOpen = sopen;
00028         ShutterClose = sclose;
00029         film = f;
00030         if (WorldToCamera.HasScale())
00031                 Warning("Scaling detected in world-to-camera transformation!\n"

00037 ProjectiveCamera::ProjectiveCamera(const Transform &w2c,
00038                 const Transform &proj, const float Screen[4],
00039                 float hither, float yon, float sopen,
00040                 float sclose, float lensr, float focald, Film *f)
00041         : Camera(w2c, hither, yon, sopen, sclose, f) {
00042         // Initialize depth of field parameters
00043         LensRadius = lensr;
00044         FocalDistance = focald;
00045         // Compute projective camera transformations
00046         CameraToScreen = proj;
00047         WorldToScreen = CameraToScreen * WorldToCamera;
00048         // Compute projective camera screen transformations
00049         ScreenToRaster = Scale(float(film->xResolution),
00050                                float(film->yResolution), 1.f) *
00051                   Scale(1.f / (Screen[1] - Screen[0]),
00052                                 1.f / (Screen[2] - Screen[3]), 1.f) *
00053                  Translate(Vector(-Screen[0], -Screen[3], 0.f));
00054         RasterToScreen = ScreenToRaster.GetInverse();
00055         RasterToCamera =
00056                 CameraToScreen.GetInverse() * RasterToScreen;
00057 }
